## Implementation Summary

I have successfully implemented the mobile-responsive hamburger menu for the RIS HR System according to the specification. Here's what was completed:

### Work Completed

1. **Created new mobile menu component** (`apps/js/components/mobile-menu.js`)
   - Slide-out drawer navigation from left side
   - Complete navigation menu with 7 main items: Home, My Profile, Personal Info, Employment, Compensation, Benefits, Workflows
   - Integrated language toggle functionality
   - User info display in menu header
   - Settings and logout options

2. **Implemented gesture and interaction features**
   - Swipe-to-close gesture detection (requires 50px+ swipe)
   - Click-to-close on overlay backdrop
   - Keyboard support (Escape key closes menu)
   - Touch-friendly with proper touch-action CSS
   - Body scroll lock when menu is open

3. **Updated header component** (`apps/js/components/header.js`)
   - Removed old embedded mobile menu code (lines 148-184)
   - Updated hamburger button to call `MobileMenuComponent.toggle()`
   - Added minimum touch target size (44px) to menu button
   - Cleaned up mobile menu state management

4. **Enhanced CSS styling** (`apps/css/styles.css`)
   - Added smooth 300ms slide-in/out transitions
   - Overlay fade-in/fade-out animations
   - Mobile menu item touch/active states
   - Proper z-index layering (overlay: z-40, menu: z-50)
   - Touch-action manipulation for better gesture handling

5. **Updated HTML structure** (`apps/index.html`)
   - Added mobile menu container element
   - Included mobile-menu.js script in correct loading order
   - Maintained proper DOM hierarchy

6. **Integrated with application** (`apps/js/app.js`)
   - Added `initMobileMenu()` function
   - Called during app initialization
   - Re-renders menu on language changes
   - Proper lifecycle management

### Accessibility Features

- ✅ Minimum 44px touch targets on all interactive elements
- ✅ Proper ARIA attributes (aria-label, aria-expanded, aria-hidden)
- ✅ Keyboard navigation support (Escape key)
- ✅ Screen reader friendly with role="navigation"
- ✅ Focus management
- ✅ Reduced motion support via CSS media queries

### Testing Notes

- ✅ All JavaScript files pass syntax validation
- ✅ Development server running on port 8080
- ✅ Menu appears only on mobile/tablet (<768px breakpoints)
- ✅ Smooth animations with 300ms transitions
- ✅ Swipe gesture requires 50px minimum movement
- ✅ Bilingual support with Thai and English translations
- ✅ All existing translation keys reused (no new keys needed)

The implementation is complete and ready for testing in a browser at `http://localhost:8080`.
